prescriptions.issue:
High number of incidents related to "Bullying" (5 cases).

This trend requires immediate attention and strategic intervention.

solution.root_cause: Multiple bullying incidents suggest a lack of clear anti-bullying protocols and insufficient peer intervention training among students.

solutions.title: Immediate Peer Mediation Training
steps: Train student ambassadors in conflict resolution
Establish peer support networks in each grade
solutions.impact: Students will have trusted peers to turn to and multiple pathways for reporting incidents.

solutions.title: Enhanced Adult Supervision Protocol
steps: Increase supervision in hotspot areas during breaks
Brief all staff on bullying identification signs
solutions.impact: Earlier detection and intervention of bullying behaviors before escalation occurs.

solutions.title: Restorative Justice Circle Implementation
steps: Facilitate mediated conversations between involved parties
Focus on understanding impact and rebuilding relationships
Follow up with ongoing support check-ins
solutions.impact: Addresses root causes of conflict while building empathy and preventing repeat incidents.

quick_wins: Send immediate email to all staff highlighting bullying warning signs
Post anonymous reporting QR codes in high-traffic student areas
